name: Egghead in space
description:
Egghead in space is an arcade platfrom game.

Based on original by Jonathan cauldwell 2002

To play:

- Use arrow key to move
- Shift to Jump
- Enter to pause in game
- S to Scanlines on/off
- F1 to play PC/CPC/NES/C64/Gameboy color mode
- Escape to Main menu
